content:
Genesis Mallorca Obtera
Product Designer and Developer
I started as a web designer in the Philippines way back 2004 and now a front-end developer based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

Started by examining every websites source code until I get to know every code's purpose and function. Through online tutorials and a whole deal of self-study, I was able to broaden my portfolio of expertise and now versatile in various web technologies.
My passion is for technology. Technology is changing very rapidly. If you don't keep up, the risk of becoming obsolete is very high.
Web technologies like HTMl, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, PHP, MySQL, jQuery, Git, NodeJS, EpressJS, ReactJS, ElectronJS, WebPack, Gulp, and Grunt.
Adobe Creative Cloud products such as Acrobat, After Effects, Audition, Dreamweaver, Flash, Illustrator, Media Encoder, Photoshop, Premiere, and Soundbooth.
Microsoft Office Access, Excel, OneDrive, OneNote, Outlook, Power Bi, Powerpoint, SharePoint, Sway, Word, Visual Studio and Studio Code.
Basic modeling, rendering, and animation using Google Sketchup and Autodesk 3D Studio Max.
Knowledgeable in a computer, tablet, and mobile phone troubleshooting, optimization, and maintenance.
Drawing, photography, basketball, games, and travel.

You can't spend all day on a computer so it's better to have something to balance it. I think especially visual crafts are handy for a front-end developer as they force you to see the world differently.

Am I the person you’re looking for?
Don't hesitate to contract me.

portfolio.title: Ascendas
portfolio.description: Also known as Accralaw Tower. An I.T. building located at Bonifacio Global City, Taguig City, Philippines. The presentation includes project location, design concept, building features, sun study, wind direction, floor plans, sections, elevations, perspectives and a walkthrough animation.

portfolio.title: Aseana
portfolio.description: A simple flash interactive presentation for the proposal building for Aseana Philippines. Aseana City is a monumental real estate undertaking. Aseana City's vision of turning water into land and land into life was realized through the successful partnership of Filipino, Belgian and Japanese corporations.

portfolio.title: Avida Tower Centrio
portfolio.description: Avida Tower Centrio is a residential condominium building in Cagayan de Oro City, Philippines. Situated at the back of the under-construction mall and hotel, the Centrio. This perspective project of Ayala Land is proposed to be a 24-storey tower and construction will start on September 2012. By that time, the Mall and Hotel are already completed.

portfolio.title: Avida Towers
portfolio.description: A interactive flash presentation of 3 projects of Avida. The Avida Tower Villareal in Cebu, Avida Centrio in Cagayan De Oro and the Avida Tower in Davao. The presentation includes project location, design concept, building features, sun study, wind direction, floor plans, sections, elevations, perspectives and a walkthrough animation.

portfolio.title: Avida Vertis North
portfolio.description: Interactive presentation for Avida Tower Vertis North, located in Quezon City, Philippines. The presentation includes project location, design concept, building features, sun study, wind direction, floor plans, sections, elevations, perspectives, walkthrough animation, area tabulation and computation.

portfolio.title: Dedon Cebu
portfolio.description: Flash interactive presentation by G&W Architects for Dedon Philippines. Dedon revolutionized the business of outdoor furniture and owned a land in Cebu. The presentation includes building concept, floor plans, elevations, sections and perspectives.

portfolio.title: Eton Green Tower
portfolio.description: A simple interactive presentation for Ayala's Eton City located at the heart of Makati, Philippines. The presentation includes building concept, sun study, wind direction, floor plans, sections, elevations, perspectives, walkthrough and area tabulation.

portfolio.title: Eton Ricogen
portfolio.description: Interactive flash presentation for Ayala's Eton project the Eton Ricogen building located in Manila, Philippines. The presentation will be used by the marketing side and included by the concept of the proposed building, floor plans, elevations, perspectives and 3D animation exported from Autodesk 3D Studio Max by Arch. Ryan Saldua.

portfolio.title: Grand Hamptons
portfolio.description: The fourth Build To Own projects by G&W Architects. It is the fourth condominium providing a corner views on all sides for each units in Fort Bonifacio Global City, Philippines. Sandwich by Manila Golf and Crescent Park view. Build To Own system is building your home at a direct cost by eliminating middle man developers, a non project related add on costs.

portfolio.title: G&W Architects
portfolio.description: G&W Architects, Engineers is a professional and full-service organization engaged in project development consultancy, architectural and engineering design, construction supervision and management services. Founded in 1971, G&W has grown steadily but dramatically through the years under its maiden name, Gilbert C. Yu and Willie C. Yu Architects and Associates.

portfolio.title: Johnson & Johnson
portfolio.description: Interactive flash presentation of G&W Architects proposed building for Johnson & Johnson Philippines. The presentation includes project location, design concept, building features, sun study, wind direction, floor plans, sections, elevations, perspectives, walkthrough animation, area tabulation and computation.

portfolio.title: Torvald Klaveness Group
portfolio.description: Interactive flash presentation for Torvald Klaveness Group. The presentation will be used by the marketing side and included by the concept of the proposed building, floor plans, elevations, perspectives and 3D animation exported from Autodesk 3D Studio Max by Arch. Ryan Saldua.

portfolio.title: Majestic Hotel
portfolio.description: A interactive touch screen presentation for the proposed eighth Build To Own project. The presentation includes the information regarding the proposed project, project location, rooms, floor plans, amenities and perspectives. Build To Own system is building your home at direct cost by eliminating middle man developer's a non project related add on costs.

portfolio.title: Palm Dale Heights
portfolio.description: Simple interactive flash persentation for Palm Dale Heights. The presentation are used for marketing and include floor plans, sections, elevations, amenities and a simple 3D animation exported from Google Sketchup by Arch. Nicoy Delos Reyes.

portfolio.title: Sapphire Residences
portfolio.description: The fifth Build To Own projects by G&W Architects. It is the fifth condominium providing a corner views on all sides for each units in Fort Bonifacio Global City. Sandwich by Manila Golf and Crescent Park view. Build To Own system is building your home at a direct cost by eliminating middle man developers, a non project related add on costs.

portfolio.title: Songlim Philippines
portfolio.description: Interactive flash presentaion for Songlim. A Koream company who owned a land in Bataan. The presentation includes project location, sun study, building concept, floor plans, elevations, perspectives and a walkthrough animation of the proposed design on the land.

portfolio.title: Titan Dragon Property
portfolio.description: Interactive flash presentation of G&W Architects proposed building for Titan Dragon Property in Quezon City, Philippines. The presentation includes project location, design concept, building features, sun study, wind direction, floor plans, sections, elevations, perspectives, walkthrough animation, area tabulation and computation.

portfolio.title: Widus International Leisure
portfolio.description: Interactive flash presentation for Widus International. The presentation includes project location, sun study, wind directions, building concept, sections, elevations, perspectives and simple 3D animation of the project.

portfolio.title: Xavier Aurora
portfolio.description: A fully animated interactive presentation export from Google Sketchup by Arch. Ryan Saldua. The presentation includes building concept, sun study, wind direction, floor plans, sections, elevations, perspectives and 3D animation.

portfolio.title: Blue Sapphire Residences
portfolio.description: The sixth Build To Own projects by G&W Architects. It is the sixth condominium providing a corner views on all sides for each units in Fort Bonifacio Global City. Sandwich by Manila Golf and Crescent Park view. Build To Own system is building your home at a direct cost by eliminating middle man developers, a non project related add on costs.

portfolio.title: Build To Own System
portfolio.description: Build To Own System is a construction industry initiated development led by G&W Architects, that builds your home at direct cost by eliminating middle man developer's a non project related add on costs, while at the same time giving homeowners unprecedented protection through the involvement of a trustee bank.

portfolio.title: Crescent Park Residences
portfolio.description: The seventh Build To Own projects by G&W Architects. It is the seventh condominium providing a corner views on all sides for each units in Fort Bonifacio Global City. Sandwich by Manila Golf and Crescent Park view. Build To Own system is building your home at a direct cost by eliminating middle man developers, a non project related add on costs.

portfolio.title: Hamptons Residences
portfolio.description: The third Build To Own projects by G&W Architects. It is the third condominium providing a corner views on all sides for each units in Fort Bonifacio Global City. Sandwich by Manila Golf and Crescent Park view. Build To Own system is building your home at a direct cost by eliminating middle man developers, a non project related add on costs.

portfolio.title: Kabillion
portfolio.description: Kabillion is the first multi platform kids network built around today's hottest TV audience viewing trends, broadband and Video on Demand. From Comcast cable and television's top kids' program producers. It's not just a show, it's what you want, when you want it.

portfolio.title: Kensington Place
portfolio.description: The second Build To Own projects by G&W Architects. It is the second condominium providing a corner views on all sides for each units in Fort Bonifacio Global City. Sandwich by Manila Golf and Crescent Park view. Build To Own system is building your home at a direct cost by eliminating middle man developers, a non project related add on costs.

portfolio.title: La Vida Verde
portfolio.description: La Vida Verde is a furniture retail company specializing in modern contemporary designs. Selling the best quality furnitures sourced out from Asia and North America. They also offer a Lifetime services to their valued customers.

portfolio.title: Penhurst Parkplace
portfolio.description: The first Build To Own projects by G&W Architects. It is the first condominium providing a corner views on all sides for each units in Fort Bonifacio Global City. Sandwich by Manila Golf and Crescent Park view. Build To Own system is building your home at a direct cost by eliminating middle man developers, a non project related add on costs.

portfolio.title: Vanarch
portfolio.description: Vanarch is a collaboration of young and upcoming talented architects and designers. After gaining significant experience with well-known firms in the region, the company was established in 2007 by Glenn Fredrick T. Khu and Ryan L. Saldua. They provide fresh and creative designs with focus on practically that can maximize your living environment and elevate your quality of life.

portfolio.title: AX Zone
portfolio.description: AX Zone is a personal web site owned by Allen Luhtrex where he share the world all the places he go on he's monthly tour.

portfolio.title: Bottleneck
portfolio.description: Bottleneck is a name of an indie band in Philippines originated in Cebu. Their first album was launch on October 2009 and the album art or design are also designed by Neo Genesis.

portfolio.title: D:Effects
portfolio.description: D:Effects or Digital Effects is a video editing company located in Hong Kong. They specialized on TV commercials, ads and Audio Visual Presentations.

portfolio.title: Guitara
portfolio.description: Guitara is a acoustic guitar shop located at Los Baños Laguna. Specialized in hand made acoustic guitar for beginner to professional guitarist.

portfolio.title: .Hackerz
portfolio.description: .Hackerz is a group or a community preventing mobile hacking in Philippines. Specialized in Symbian, iOS, WinMobile and Android applications.

portfolio.title: Help Hosting
portfolio.description: Help Hosting is like a yellow page for free domain names or even free web hosting that supports ASP, ASPX, PHP, xHTML, XML or even MySQL, depending what the client needs.

portfolio.title: Hyperides
portfolio.description: Hyperides is a car shop located in Ortigas Philippines. From imported exotic cars to sporty to V.I.P. cars, whether you're shopping for a new, certified or used car, you can find it here.

portfolio.title: Media Design
portfolio.description: Media Design also known as MeDesign is a printing company located in Mandaluyong Philippines. They specialized in banners, business cards, calling cards, post cards, brochures, leaflets, flyers, stationery, posters, booklets and tarpaulin printing.

portfolio.title: Skate X
portfolio.description: Skate X is your one stop skate shop located at Tutuban in Manila. From branded boards to branded parts, Skate X is totally your one stop skate shop.

portfolio.title: Vlink
portfolio.description: Vlink is a computer rental located in Manila near Adamson University of the Philippines. The computer rental have a Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 processor, MSI P45 motherboard, 4Gb DDR2 of memory, Nvidia 9600GT video card and 620watts of power suppy.

portfolio.title: Wiltshire
portfolio.description: Bonifacio Wiltshire is a proposed condominium building in Fort Bonifacio Global City. Wiltshire is a ceremonial county in South West England. It is landlocked and borders the counties of Dorset, Somerset, Hampshire, Gloucestershire, Oxfordshire  and Berkshire.

portfolio.title: Mobitrans
portfolio.description: From m-learning to mobile gaming, Mobitrans is the global leader in value added services for mobile devices. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in the vibrant city of Dubai, Mobitrans employs over 50 multinational experts in the digital media industry. In partnership with over 120 mobile operators and advertisers worldwide, we have expanded our award-winning portfolio into 42 countries, and are live on every continent.

portfolio.title: Babelbay
portfolio.description: Babel Bay is a premium language learning service. Our service contains interactive courses on some of the world's most popular languages. They are perfect for beginners, travelers or anyone who wants to improve their foreign language vocabulary.

portfolio.title: MAcademy
portfolio.description: MAcademy is the world’s number one mobile learning service where you can learn when and where you want. All MAcademy courses are developed based on the Interpolated Memory Test Methodology (IMTM), which according to Harvard studies by Karl K. Szpunar reduces mind wandering and improves learning online lectures.

portfolio.title: Mobile Academy
portfolio.description: Mobile Academy is one of the top m-learning services in the world that puts the ‘smart’ in your smartphone. Our award-winning service is packed with stimulating and interactive courses on a variety of subjects ranging from personal to professional development. These mobile-optimised courses are designed to ensure that your learning experience is fun and effective.

portfolio.title: VIP Games
portfolio.description: VIPgames.me delivers the most popular games in the world straight to your mobile device. Enjoy the best of arcade, sports and brain teasing games that guarantee hours of gaming entertainment!

portfolio.title: Game Panda
portfolio.description: GamePanda delivers the world's top trending games straight to your mobile device. Enjoy the best of arcade, sports and brain games that guarantee hours of gaming entertainment!

portfolio.title: Sky Games
portfolio.description: SkyGames delivers the world's most popular games straight to your mobile device. Enjoy the best of arcade, sports and brain-teasing games that guarantee hours of gaming entertainment.

portfolio.title: Moxi Games
portfolio.description: MoxiGames.me delivers the world’s most popular games straight to your mobile device. Enjoy the best of arcade, sports and brain teasing games that guarantee hours of mobile gaming entertainment.

portfolio.title: GAP
portfolio.description: GAP is an American worldwide clothing and accessories retailer. Gap was founded in 1969 by Donald Fisher and Doris F. Fisher and is headquartered in San Francisco, California. The company operates six primary divisions: Gap (the namesake banner), Banana Republic, Old Navy, Intermix, Hill City, and Athleta.

portfolio.title: Mamas & Papas
portfolio.description: Mamas & Papas is a UK-based nursery brand and manufacturer supplying prams, pushchairs, baby products, furniture and maternity wear. It was established in Huddersfield in 1981 by David and Luisa Scacchetti, both of Italian ancestry, whose initial aim was to bring Italian design to the UK baby buggy market.

portfolio.title: Nisnass
portfolio.description: Nisnass isn't just a brand, it's a community - an app where you will find something for everyone: trendy styles for the fashion-savvy, comfortable basics for the minimalists, fun outfits for the kids with imagination, and tasteful touches to amp up your home décor, all at your fingertips.

portfolio.title: Ounass
portfolio.description: Ounass, the definitive home of luxury, is the Middle East’s first premiere luxury website offering the world’s most exclusive brands in an editorial environment that is globally relevant but locally led. The dual-language website offers a curated selection of women’s ready-to-wear, footwear, handbags, fine jewellery, cosmetics and home merchandise, with many exclusive items found only on Ounass.com.
